p: The interview questions were developed based on a review of relevant articles in the literature and experts' opinions. Semi-structured, open-ended interviews that lasted between 30 and 90 min each were held via Zoom with 10 nurses. The interviews were guided by an interview guideline, and all interviews were held in Arabic. The interviews were tape-recorded, transcribed verbatim in Arabic, translated into English, and then analyzed using thematic analysis. The transcripts were translated from Arabic into English by the research team and then checked by a qualified translator and one of the study participants, so as to ensure the highest level of accuracy.
